pages.text: Meioneurites is a genus of kalligrammatid lacewing known multiple sites in Jurassic-Cretaceous, such as Solnhofen limestone in Germany. M. spectabilis from Karabastau Formation, Upper Jurassic of Kazakhstan, preserved head structure of this insect well, showing antennae and mouthparts.
